text: um as far as doing a similar project again with these lights um what i would do differently is you know honestly i would get a whole bunch more of these so um yeah i've got a bunch now in different areas of the home but um i would get a bunch more i'm i'm thinking about it actually i might even get i don't know maybe 15 of them more and they also double as uh lighting the floor as you're walking down a dark hallway so in case you don't want to turn all the lights on you know so they they actually do other things um but you know they're mostly just for decor but i'm um uh exploring other options uh using these things so really as far as uh the features um i like them because they are motion so they detect motion so i can walk by my uh displays my artwork or whatever and they just light up and it's just kind of nice you know having that um you know as far as any other uh tools that can make it easier that's about as easy as it gets and i'm very happy uh to have found those
